channel.title: Sword of kings
channel.description:
here the dl :P http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VTQN0SN0
heres the ints
[QUOTE]if(i == 8500) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 8050; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 8051; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 8051; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Sword Of Kings"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A Sword Of Unimgainable Power!".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/QUOTE]
i do pics later and seen my other stuff so u know its good

item.title: Sword of kings
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

alrdy download on diff website nice leech

How do you know this is not the same person just releasing on more than one site. Think about thinks before acusing of leeching. Also, we leeched from diferent things all the time to make models. Either from a real life picture or some cartoon-ish picture. In reality, most things in life are what you call a “leech”.

@Frell - I think this kid is just acusing people of leeching without giving proof, he acused my Inifinity blade of it being leeched from dragonfable, ill admit it was a thought from a sword but not one that i know of that is from it. He provided no proof either though. So i believe this kis just wants to “leech” everybody himself.

Read full topic

item.title: Sword of kings
item.dc:creator: @pokerking pokerking
item.description:
@pokerking wrote:

here the dl
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VTQN0SN0

heres the ints

[QUOTE]if(i == 8500) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want
class8.anInt174 = 8050; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 8051; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 8051; // Female Wield
class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller
class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards
class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up
class8.aString170 = “Sword Of Kings”; // Item Name
class8.aByteArray178 = “A Sword Of Unimgainable Power!”.getBytes(); // Item Examine
}[/QUOTE]
